name: Seizure
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Irene Adler → remove Seizure from the game.
Discard 1 [[skill ]]upgrade you control. If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Mister Sinister
text: Incite 2. Villainous. While Destiny's Warning side scheme is in play, Mister Sinister does not activate. When Revealed: If Mister Sinister is already in play, discard this card then Mister Sinister activates against you even if Destiny's Warning side scheme is in play.

name: Destiny's Warning
text: Wha--? You Spoilsport--! When Revealed: remove 1[per_hero] from the main scheme. [star] Boost: Put Destiny's Warning into play. [hazard][hazard]

name: So, what's the plan ?
text: When Revealed: Remove 1[per_hero] threat from Destiny's Warning. If you cannot, Mister Sinister activates against you. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
